Interface DiscreteTimeFilter<StateType extends CloneableSerializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    StateType - Type of state to use to store the previous history.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, CloneableSerializable, Evaluator<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>, java.io.Serializable, StatefulEvaluator<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,StateType>, Vectorizable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoRegressiveMovingAverageFilter, MovingAverageFilter
